Package com.poseidon.app.security

Class JwtAuthFilter

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.filter.GenericFilterBean
org.springframework.web.filter.OncePerRequestFilter
com.poseidon.app.security.JwtAuthFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.Filter, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.EnvironmentAware, org.springframework.core.env.EnvironmentCapable, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware
@Component public class JwtAuthFilter extends org.springframework.web.filter.OncePerRequestFilter
JWT authentication filter that validates JWT tokens for each HTTP request.

This filter extends OncePerRequestFilter and is invoked once per request. It extracts the JWT token from an HTTP-only cookie named "JWT_TOKEN", validates it, and sets the Authentication in the SecurityContextHolder if the token is valid.

If the JWT token is invalid or the role is missing, authentication is not set, and a RoleNotFoundException is thrown in case of missing role.

Security context is updated with a UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken containing the username and role extracted from the token.

  • Method Details

    • doFilterInternal

      protected void doFilterInternal(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, jakarta.servlet.FilterChain chain) throws jakarta.servlet.ServletException, IOException, com.poseidon.app.exceptions.RoleNotFoundException
      Filters each HTTP request to validate JWT authentication.

      This method is invoked once per request. It performs the following steps:

      • Extracts the JWT token from the "JWT_TOKEN" cookie.
      • Validates the token using the JwtService.
      • Extracts the username and role from the token.
      • Throws RoleNotFoundException if role is missing.
      • Sets UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken in SecurityContextHolder.

      Specified by:
      doFilterInternal in class org.springframework.web.filter.OncePerRequestFilter
      Parameters:
      request - the HTTP request
      response - the HTTP response
      chain - the filter chain
      Throws:
      jakarta.servlet.ServletException - if a servlet exception occurs
      IOException - if an input or output exception occurs
      com.poseidon.app.exceptions.RoleNotFoundException - if JWT role is missing or blank
